item.description:
We will be getting together to support the incredibly talented, up and coming singer/songwriter Krysta Youngs for the launch party for her debut CD.
Along with Krysta singing from her debut CD, there are other musical acts, an open bar from 8-9pm, magician, caricature artist and body painting. Tickets are only $10.

For advance tickets, please click here:

Krysta Youngs CD Party Advance Tickets

Tickets can also be purchased at the door.

Let's suppport Krysta for this exciting event. Not only is Krysta immensly talented, she also works hard to support local non profit organizations. Krysta is the lead vocalist for the Project Smile theme song, which will be debuted October 3 at Project Smile's 5th Anniversary Celebration.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet outside Saint at 8pm. If raining, we will meet at the bottom of the stairs inside Saint at 8pm. Look for Catherine (see photo). If you are late, please look for us in the main bar area or call 774 232 0000. Please try to arrive on time.
item.why: Because it is a great time- wonderful music by great acts, including the star of the show- Krysta Youngs. Open bar from 8-9pm.
item.name: Krysta Youngs CD Release Party at Saint- open bar and great time!
